## ContainerConfiguration.defaultResolver() method

Gets the default resolver to use during auto-registration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
defaultResolver(key: Key, handler: Container): Resolver;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

key


</td><td>

[Key](../fast-element.key/)


</td><td>

The key to register the dependency with.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

handler


</td><td>

[Container](../fast-element.container/)


</td><td>

The container that is handling the auto-registration request.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Resolver](../fast-element.resolver/)
